title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 328.8 - Oaths, record of proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 328.8 - Oaths, record of proceedings

State Regulations

The arbitrators shall be required to take the oath of
office. The chairman, Workers' Compensation Board, shall appoint a recording
clerk, who is authorized to administer oaths under the Workers' Compensation

Law, who shall administer the oath, and make a record of the proceedings on the
prescribed form. The chairman, Workers' Compensation Board, shall also appoint
a secretary to the arbitration committee. A stenographic transcript of the
hearing shall not be required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
328.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
